if the player aborts out of dialogue, go straight to her revealing her true
appearance and petrifying everyone
There are other PC's present that can be seen

Xanos is present and she can see him

after petrifying the player, Heurodis walks up
and initiates dialogue again

again, if the player aborts the dialogue, move right to the end

Heurodis unveils her hood and petrifies everyone
pause a moment after doing so and have her walk
closer to the PC, then re-initiate dialogue
